question: Which one of the following shows the correct sequence of occurrence of four towns/ cities as one proceeds from west to east?
explanation:
• Sri Kshetra Pandharpur is a well known pilgrimage town on the banks of Chandrabhaga River in Solapur district, Maharashtra.
• Gulbarga is also known as Kalaburagi. It is a city in the Indian state of Karnataka, India.
• Kothagudem is a town in Telangana state. Kothagudem is the headquarters of the Bhadradri Kothagudem district in the state of Telangana.
• Visakhapatnam is a port city and industrial center in the Indian state of Andhra Pradesh, on the Bay of Bengal. It\'s known for its many beaches, including Ramakrishna Beach, home to a preserved submarine at the Kursura Submarine Museum.
